H0.text: For what medical condition would a doctor administer an antipyretic. Meningitis

H1.text: For what medical condition would a doctor administer an antipyretic. Sepsis

H2.text: For what medical condition would a doctor administer an antipyretic. Pneumonia

H3.text: For what medical condition would a doctor administer an antipyretic. Fever

A4.text: The antipyretic ibuprofen is effective in reducing fevers in children.

A5.text: Using both paracetamol and ibuprofen at the same time or alternating between the two is more effective at decreasing fever than using only paracetamol or ibuprofen.
